verses.verse: He who is wounded in the <S%H6481>stones,<s%> or has his privy <S%H8212>member<s%> cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

A <S%H4464>bastard<s%> shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> even to the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall none of his <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

An <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> or a <S%H4125>Moabite<s%> shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> even to the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall none belonging to them <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5769>forever:<s%>

<S%H1697>because<s%> they <S%H6923>didn't<s%> meet you with <S%H3899>bread<s%> and with <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> when you came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and because they <S%H7936>hired<s%> against you <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> from <S%H6604>Pethor<s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia,<s%> to curse <S%H7043>you.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H14>wouldn't<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam;<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H7045>curse<s%> into a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> because Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> loved <S%H157>you.<s%>
You shall not <S%H1875>seek<s%> their <S%H7965>peace<s%> nor their <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> all your <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

You shall not <S%H8581>abhor<s%> an <S%H130>Edomite;<s%> for he is your <S%H251>brother:<s%> you shall not <S%H8581>abhor<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> because you lived as a <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> in his <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> who are <S%H3205>born<s%> to them shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
When you go <S%H3318>forth<s%> in <S%H4264>camp<s%> against your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> then you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> yourselves from every <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

If there is among you any <S%H376>man<s%> who is not <S%H2889>clean<s%> by reason of that which <S%H7137>happens<s%> him by <S%H3915>night,<s%> then shall he <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%> He shall not <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H4264>camp:<s%>

but it shall <S%H6153>be,<s%> when evening comes <S%H6437>on,<s%> he shall <S%H7364>bathe<s%> himself in <S%H4325>water;<s%> and when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>down,<s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
You shall have a place <S%H3027>also<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> where you shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>abroad:<s%>

and you shall have a <S%H3489>paddle<s%> among your <S%H240>weapons;<s%> and it shall <S%H3427>be,<s%> when you sit down <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> you shall <S%H2658>dig<s%> <S%H7725>therewith,<s%> and shall turn back and <S%H3680>cover<s%> that which comes from <S%H6627>you:<s%>

for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>walks<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of your <S%H4264>camp,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5414>you,<s%> and to give up your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4264>you;<s%> therefore your camp shall be <S%H6918>holy,<s%> that he may not <S%H7200>see<s%> an <S%H6172>unclean<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> in <S%H7725>you,<s%> and turn away from <S%H310>you.<s%>
You shall not <S%H5462>deliver<s%> to his <S%H113>master<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> who is <S%H5337>escaped<s%> from his master to <S%H113>you:<s%>

he shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with <S%H7130>you,<s%> in the midst of <S%H4725>you,<s%> in the place which he shall <S%H977>choose<s%> within <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> where it pleases him <S%H2896>best:<s%> you shall not oppress <S%H3238>him.<s%>
There shall be no <S%H6948>prostitute<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> neither shall there be a <S%H6945>sodomite<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

You shall not <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H868>hire<s%> of a <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> or the <S%H4242>wages<s%> of a <S%H3611>dog,<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> for any <S%H5088>vow:<s%> for even <S%H8147>both<s%> these are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall not lend on <S%H5391>interest<s%> to your <S%H251>brother;<s%> <S%H5391>interest<s%> of <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H5392>interest<s%> of <S%H400>food,<s%> <S%H5392>interest<s%> of <S%H1697>anything<s%> that is lent on <S%H5391>interest:<s%>

to a <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> you may lend on <S%H5391>interest;<s%> but to your <S%H251>brother<s%> you shall not lend on <S%H5391>interest,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in all that you <S%H4916>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H776>to,<s%> in the land where you <S%H935>go<s%> in to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>

When you shall <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> you shall not be <S%H309>slack<s%> to <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H3068>it:<s%> for Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1875>surely<s%> <S%H1875>require<s%> it of <S%H2399>you;<s%> and it would be sin in you.
But if you shall <S%H2308>forbear<s%> to <S%H5087>vow,<s%> it shall be no sin in <S%H2399>you.<s%>

That which is gone <S%H4161>out<s%> of your <S%H8193>lips<s%> you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H6213>do;<s%> according as you have <S%H5087>vowed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> a freewill <S%H5071>offering,<s%> which you have <S%H1696>promised<s%> with your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

When you <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> then you may <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes<s%> your <S%H7648>fill<s%> at your own <S%H5315>pleasure;<s%> but you shall not <S%H5414>put<s%> any in your <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>

When you <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s standing <S%H7054>grain,<s%> then you may <S%H6998>pluck<s%> the <S%H4425>ears<s%> with your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> but you shall not <S%H5130>move<s%> a <S%H2770>sickle<s%> to your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s standing <S%H7054>grain.<s%>
